Package io.fusionfire.rx.java.fruit.core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractFruitObservable  
    FruitBasketObservableFactory
    Fruit Basket Observable Factory Factory creates a Fruit Basket Observable with Fruit Basket and returns the Observable Based on the Subscription to the Observable (By the Observer): 1.
    FruitBasketRepository<T extends Fruit>
    Apple Basket is the Data Source / Event Stream Basket will be used by the Observable to emit the Apple to Observer Apple Processor Observer will do action on the emitted Apple from the Observable
    FruitProcessor<T extends Fruit>
    Fruit Processor is the Observer in Rx Paradigm Processor waits for Fruits Emitted by the Fruit Basket Observable and do the processing (that is cutting Fruit into 5 pieces.
